Container.Name: hydroqc2mqtt
Container.Overview:
This project was created to provide a way to access Hydro-Qu√©bec account and winter credit data in Home-Assistant.
This module use the hydroqc library to fetch all pertinent account information and winter credit signals to be sent to MQTT. It also provide Home-Assistant discovery topics to create all the relevant sensors in Home-Assistant.
It also includes a separate logic that sends the hourly consumption statistics to Home-Assitant via websocket
Container.DonateText: Don't donate to me! Instead, please donate the creators of the apps, but if you insist

Config.Name: Contract 0 Name
Config.Description: Name of the contract, will appear in Home Assistant and in the hydroqc topics.

Config.Name: Contract 0 Customer number
Config.Description: Customer number (Numéro de client) from your invoice. 10 digits, you may need to add a leading 0 to the value Ex: ‘987 654 321’ will be ‘0987654321’

Config.Name: Contract 0 Account Number
Config.Description: Account Number (Numéro de compte) from your invoice

Config.Name: Contract 0 Contract number
Config.Description: Contract Number (Numéro de contrat) from your invoice. 10 digits, you may need to add a leading 0 to the value. Ex: ‘123 456 789’ will be ‘0123456789’

Config.Name: Contract 0 Homeassistant websocket URL
Config.Description: URL to your Home-Assistant installation websocket API

Config.Name: Contract 0 Homeassistant Token
Config.Description: Long-lived Home-Assistant access token to be used to access the API

Config.Name: Contract 0 Hourly sync consumption Flag
Config.Description: Enable importing hourly consumption from Hydro-Quebec (last 24h)

Container.Changes: ### 2020.09.30 - Update registry - add changelog ### 2022.09.29 - Initial Release
